title: 'Good quality belt
rating: much better then purchasing from offline markets'
body: '5.0 out of 5 stars''The item is exactly as described. The only issue i had with such type of belts were that they would start tearing from the place where it rubs with the buckle. But this belts grove based locking system keeps a gap between the belt and buckle hence it does not get damaged at all!!'
